item.title: [Python] I tried Poetry for the first time & I was moved from Pipenv to poetry
item.description: ## Motivation I recently tried poetry because the installation of pipenv is quite slow. I will summarize what I found after trying it all the way through. I’m using Pipenv, so compare it with that. Please refer to Official Doc,becauseIdon’tdescribethepackagerelatedcommands(build,publish…) or detailed functions. About Poetry Poetry is a Python package management tool. Like Pipenv, it resolves dependencies and installs and uninstalls packages, The poetry.lock file allows other users to install the package with the right version and dependencies.
